lines.text: We don't have any towels. We had one once, but it was stolen by a hotel.
Oh! It looks like somebody had an accident.
THAT'S a funny thing to call it!
Who's she? I've never seen HER before.
She's new in these parts.
She's embarassed - I think she's still a virgin.
Well if that's the case, she should be embarassed. I've never heard of such a thing.
Well I'm trying to learn, honestly, but I can't have everything shoved down my throat all at once.
Well I don't see why not.
Rocks can't talk.
Is that so?
Oh, Dee! You're so great! I love you like a brother!
Dum, aren't you forgetting? I AM your brother.
Well if it feels good, there's a good chance it must be bad.
And after the King's ball comes off, we're eating dinner in the Queen's box.
Dinner in the Queen's box?
Well not dinner exactly, it's more like a boxed lunch.

[to Alice]
May my rod and staff comfort thee.
I want her head!
Please Ma'am, I'm just learning about life, I'm too young to die, don't cut off my head.
You misunderstand me, doll. I don't wanna cut off your head. I want you to give me some head.
Don't you think you should put that thing away?
Certainly not, I just let it out! Don't you like it?
Well... Yes, it's very nice.
You may touch it.
Oh, I couldn't!
I don't see why not.
Well, because it's yours.

[rolling his eyes]
I'll share it with you.
What is this?
It's my breast.
What is this for?
One day, whan I have a baby, it'll have milk in it.
Oh, it's pretty.

[Alice finds the book "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland" by Lewis Carroll, things]
That's funny. I never read this one, when I was a little girl.
[now saying to herself]
I miss so much. Just about everything

[Alice is asking for a fair trial]
A Trial? Where is it written, that we have to give you a trial?
It says so right here in this book.
[showing the King of Hearts and the Queen of Hearts the book "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland"]
Oh my goodness... Are you all right?... I thought I'd broken it.
